backend/main.mo: Defines task, profile, cooking assignment, and recurring chore types and exposes CRUD-style canister methods with authorization checks and in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping planned features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style definitions configuring light/dark color variables and shared base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling Internet Identity auth and rendering tabbed navigation with TodayFocus and all major views.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskDialog.ts: Dialog for creating tasks including voice dictation, actor availability checks, form state, and task submission logic.
frontend/src/components/CalendarDayPlann: Daily planner view showing tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores for a given day with navigation and completion toggling.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Main calendar component managing month, week, and day views and loading tasks, cooking assignments, profiles, and recurring chores.
frontend/src/components/CalendarWeekPlan: Renders a weekly planner showing tasks, cooking assignments, and chores for each day with navigation and task toggling.
frontend/src/components/DinnerRota.tsx: Weekly dinner rota allowing assigning cooks, editing meal descriptions, and viewing fairness stats with voice dictation support.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a taskâ€™s name, description, assignee, and due date with optional voice dictation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with title, user avatar menu, and logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/LightweightMonth: Compact month grid showing tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores with month navigation and date selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the login screen UI and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/People.tsx: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of person profiles with colors and principals.
frontend/src/components/PersonBadge.tsx: Displays a small colored badge label for a person.
frontend/src/components/PersonProfileSel: Allows selecting a person profile or manually entering a principal ID, with optional 'Me' autofill.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresD: Provides a full dialog for creating, editing, and managing recurring chores with voice dictation and validation.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresI: Shows a compact overview of recurring chores grouped by weekday with an option to manage them.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Displays and manages household tasks, including adding, editing, completing, clearing, and showing recurring chores.
frontend/src/components/TodayFocus.tsx: Displays tasks and cooking assignments due today, with loading skeletons and task status icons. Fetches tasks, cooking assignments, and profiles using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/VoiceDictationBu: A microphone toggle button with tooltip and visual listening indicator, handling supported/disabled states. Triggers start or stop callbacks for dictation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes. Supports authenticated and anonymous actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithReadiness: Wraps useActor with readiness flags to prevent mutations before the actor is fully initialized. Exposes actor, fetching state, readiness, and initialization errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Dfinity Internet Identity, managing login, logout, stored identities, and status flags. Exposes identity and auth actions to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/usePeopleProfilesQuer: Defines profile CRUD query and mutation hooks using the backend actor, with readiness gating and query invalidation. Shows toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains core task and cooking assignment query and mutation hooks, including add/update/delete operations guarded by actor readiness. Invalidates related queries and reports errors via toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeedSampleData.ts: Empty file placeholder for future seed-data logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: Custom hook that syncs React state to sessionStorage with JSON serialization and functional updates. Provides persistent state across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceDictation.ts: Custom React hook for managing Web Speech API dictation with support checks, errors, and transcript callbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and imports global styles.
frontend/src/types/webSpeech.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the Web Speech API including SpeechRecognition types.
frontend/src/utils/actorAvailability.ts: Utilities for checking actor readiness and generating user-friendly availability messages.
Helpers for formatting diagnostic context and safely stringifying errors during actor initialization.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utilities ensuring optional Candid values are encoded consistently for serialization.
frontend/src/utils/cookingAssignmentLabe: Functions to derive labels and colors for cooking assignments based on profiles and principals.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Diagnostic logging utilities for deployment steps with guidance and wrapped async operations.
frontend/src/utils/fairness.ts: Computes fairness statistics over cooking assignments for various date ranges using labels and colors.
frontend/src/utils/personProfiles.ts: Resolves principals to display labels and colors using person profiles with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Provides safe parsing and validation utilities for principal IDs without throwing errors.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreDiagnos: Logs detailed start and outcome diagnostics for recurring chore mutations with safe error stringification.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreMutatio: Normalizes backend and agent errors into user-facing messages and structured diagnostic details.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresPrevie: Generates weekday-grouped and upcoming previews of recurring chores with readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresSchedu: Determines whether recurring chores should appear on a date based on timeline rules and filters chores for a given day.
frontend/src/utils/taskDayKey.ts: Converts dates and task due timestamps into normalized yyyy-MM-dd day keys.
frontend/src/utils/taskDueDayGrouping.ts: Groups tasks by normalized due date into sorted day buckets, adding a 'no due date' group when needed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation.
frontend/src/utils/voiceDictationDiagnos: Logs diagnostic events for voice dictation operations, capturing environment context without exposing transcripts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content scanning paths, extended color system using CSS variables, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for a UI feature adding a clearer microphone-listening indicator, including existing features, new requests, metadata, and schema versions.
